name: Space Easy
description:
You've awoken from a long sleep to find yourself drifting through space on a futuristic speakeasy, inhabited by only the robot bartender 'Brobot' and your mechanical feline companion 'Nyandroid'. Go through old ship logs and learn about your own history in order to discover where your ship is headed, and why. 

This was a solo project created to practice my writing, composing, and art skills. Any feedback is welcomed and appreciated!
